chapter.title: Setting Up
chapter.para: Setting up an ERP system is like starting your business all over again, although in the virtual world. Thankfully it is not as hard as the real business and you get to do a trial too!
Implementation requires the implementer to take a step back and set aside some time to do this right. This is usually not a couple-of-hours, after-work kind of a project.

section.title: Setup Wizard
section.para: The Setup Wizard helps you quickly setup your ERPnext by helping you create your company, Items, Customer, Suppliers and will also setup a basic website with this data. Here is a quick overview of the steps:

section.title: Step 1: Language
section.para: Select your language. ERPNext is available in more than 20 languages.

section.title: Step 2: Profile Details
section.para: Enter Users Profile Details like Name, User ID and preferred password.

section.title: Step 3: Company Details
section.para: Enter Company Details like Name, Abbreviation and Financial Year Details.

section.title: Step 4: Currency and Timezone
section.para: Set your country name, currency and timezone.

section.title: Step 5: Letterhead and Logo
section.para: Attach Company Letterhead and Company Logo..
